metadata.title: CVE-2024-46686 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:smb/client: avoid dereferencing rdata=NULL in smb2_new_read_req()This happens when called from SMB2_read() while using rdmaand reaching the rdma_readwrite_threshold.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
